Text: It's stupidly split into RAR files, but it's not fake. In fact, the quality is great. Next time this should be extracted before being put into a torrent so people won't be afraid to download and we can get more seeders.

Sceneline always split their torrents. I don't know why they do it really. I download from them if there are no other HQ torrents available, they don't post fakes, it's just bothersome to join the files after downloading.
